text: Am I reading correctly that it supports both LP and MIP? That might push me to update LongestPaths to MOI.

elements.text: Am I reading correctly that it supports both LP and MIP? That might push me to update LongestPaths to MOI.

text: AFAIK, HiGHS is an LP solver with basic support for MIP, i.e., it should handle small MIPs but will likely die on large ones

elements.text: AFAIK, HiGHS is an LP solver with basic support for MIP, i.e., it should handle small MIPs but will likely die on large ones

text: Thanks, then I guess I'll wait with trying it.

elements.text: Thanks, then I guess I'll wait with trying it.

text: looks like it's under very active development, which is exciting.  Performance so far doesn't look that good, any reason to believe it'll be more competitive in the future?
